title: "Your account is in the process of transferring." Need help!
body:
I went to log into League the other day and it gave me a message on the client version that said "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact Player Support". So I went to login to the page it sent me to and it told me that I had the wrong password or something about the region and I know that's the right password. So I sent a report and they emailed me backing wanting proof that it's mine and I sent proof back that it is but its been about 19 hours and I am wondering what is wrong with my account? I think that it is hacked but I am not exactly sure. I ended up making this account to play for the time being but I want to play on my main since I have a ton of skins and all of my main champions. If someone could help me out I would appreciate it a ton! Thanks! P.S. The account name is **Squidyy17**
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Don't worry! Our account recovery team is good at helping out cases like this, and any repairs that might be needed. It can take some time for them to get back to you, depending on the size of their current queue. 

Feel free to shoot me your ticket number and I can check on the status for you ^_^!

i have a ticket is (#30595163) but i cant login to my account why ?
if you can help me please

Thanks! I actually got CrunchyBonBon, he replies pretty quick but I'm confused about my account.. Does it mean that my account has been hacked? I'm confused on what is going on with my account. I just sent him proof that it is my account, what happens if that all goes through? Do I just change my password or? Sorry for all these questions just very confused and kinda scared because I put a little bit of my money into the account.

Since you're currently in touch with our account specialists through a ticket, it'll be best to leave the rest up to them. They'll be able to guide you through each step in getting your account safely back in your hands.

You're in good hands, and they'll solve this for you as fast as they can!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i'm having the exact same issue..
same problem here, i can log in on my main account here, but not into game
i am having this problem. no response form riot. ticket was sent yesterday.

Hey, I just got the same error last night and I fixed it literally 2 minutes ago!
I had recently transferred my account and there was a patch with recently came up. Turns out that the server was set to the wrong one, and then I switched my client to the server which I always used, and it's all good!
Hope I helped you, I was almost in tears when I thought Riot wouldn't help me :D. Good day to you, sir.
i have the same issue i cannot login into my amurf account because this message pops up :(

It really sucks and is super frustrating because I talked to Support and they said I didn't give proof that match up that the account is mine so I don't know what to do... It's really stupid because the account is mine and has always been mine.. I've spent like 200$ and my twitch is the same name as my League name... But CrunchyBonBon said that he needs proof that I actually made the account... Like how am I supposed to remember all of that crap I'm too busy worrying about school to remember my first 1350 champ etc. {{item:3070}}
